title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with Docker-like CLI for pulling and running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip-installable.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings or chat endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker, supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with REPL, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin for VS Code that uses local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local LLMs as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows with Ollama models (chat, completion, embeddings).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service container for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app template combining Ollama LLM with Chroma vector store for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client library with GenServer behaviour for streaming chat completions from Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama with build.zig integration and cross-compilation support.
